meanings.definition: A person who shares a mess or dining area with another
meanings.sent1: My messmates and I always eat together in the cafeteria.
meanings.sent2: I consider my roommate my messmate because we often have dinner together.
meanings.sent3: My messmates and I tried to cook a meal together, but it turned into a disaster!
meanings.sent4: In the bustling cafeteria, my messmates blend in like pieces of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The bond between messmates is as strong as the aroma of a home-cooked meal.

meanings.definition: A companion or friend with whom one shares meals
meanings.sent1: My best friend is not just a companion but also my messmate during lunch.
meanings.sent2: Every evening, my messmate and I enjoy a meal together at our favorite restaurant.
meanings.sent3: My messmate always brings the most delicious snacks to share during our picnics.
meanings.sent4: She is not just a friend but a messmate who adds flavor to my life.
meanings.sent5: The laughter shared with a messmate is the sweetest dessert after a meal.
